page.title: 04BIRDS OF THE AREA
page.content: At different times of the year many species of birds can be seen on the river and banks. {Herons}which nest near by, can be seen all year round. {Lerryn}is well known in the area for the{mallard ducks,}which live on the river and visitors often come to feed them. It is also possible to see any of the following birds:- {curlews, sand-pipers, redshanks, , {mallards, herring-gulls, black-backed {gulls, black-headed gulls, {little-greebs and kingfishers. In very cold weather{green- {finches, red-wings, field-fares and{lapwings}come down to the warmer climate near the river. {Buzzards, {nut-hatchs}and{Peregrine Falcons}can be seen at Boconnoc.
